title: Braised Chicken Wings with a Secret
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons groundnut oil', '2 teaspoons sugar', '400g chicken wings, lightly scored with a sharp knife and cut at the joints', '1 (330ml) tin cola', '2 teaspoons finely chopped ginger', '2 petals star anise', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons finely chopped spring onions']
